subject: Results and Settings with EVPMaker
author: reesclarke_69
full_text:
Hey guys  I am wondering how has the research been working with the 
EVPMaker, and what is the different settings that everybody has been 
using to get the best results?

Myself, I haven't had too much luck with it, but I'm still working with 
it. I haven't use it but 3 times. I know some people here has been 
getting great results, and I was wandering if they could post their 
settings they have been using to get these results.  Please share the 
knowledge!

Rees
